item.title: LA Neighborhood Scores
item.description: This project is currently being updated. Table of Contents Introduction [Workflow Pileine]{#WF} Data Processing Feature Extraction Data Wrangling Storing Individual Datasets Data Merging - SparkSQL Firebase Web Application Conclusion Data Sources Goals Introduction The City of Los Angeles, home to nearly 4 million residents, is a trailblazer in many aspects, including data transparency.

item.title: Predicting Statistical Causes of Wildfires
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Goals Notebook Prediction Graphs Conclusion Introduction This dataset is a spatial database of historical wildfires in the United States from 1992 to 2015.
